component.name: OpenTrace
component.summary: A cross-platform GUI wrapper for NextTrace
NextTrace 的跨平台 GUI 界面

description.p: OpenTrace is a cross-platform GUI wrapper for NextTrace. Bringing you a sense of familiarity.
Note: This build uses a dirty approach to run program with cap_net_raw caps. You'll need to allow pkexec to setcap at the first use.
If map isn't showing up, try switching to Google maps in File->Preferences.
